g2.goal: Slice some chicken and give it to my cat.
g2.full_content:
Task name: Pet cat
Goal: Slice some chicken and give it to my cat.
Guidance: Cut some chicken, and put the chicken close to the cat.
Logic: k1 then k2

behavior k1():
    body:
        bind chicken: item where:
            is_food_chicken(chicken)
        achieve cut(chicken)

behavior k2():
    body:
        bind cat: item where:
            is_cat(cat)
        bind chicken: item where:
            is_food_chicken(chicken)
        achieve close(chicken,cat)

g5.full_content:
Task name: Cook some food
Goal: Make oil fried banana.
Guidance: The banana is already peeled. To fried it, find a fryingpan, put it on the stove. Turn on the stove and add some oil. Put the banana in the fryingpan.
Logic: k1

behavior k1():
    body:
        bind pan: item where:
            is_fryingpan(pan)
        bind stove: item where:
            is_stove(stove)
        bind banana: item where:
            is_food_banana(banana)
        bind oil: item where:
            is_oil(oil)
        achieve on(pan,stove)
        achieve is_on(stove)
        achieve inside(oil, pan)
        achieve inside(banana, pan)

g1.full_content:
Task name: Prepare dinner
Goal: Boil some rice by pot.
Guidance: Fill the pot with water. Put the rice into the pot. Put the pot on the stove and turn on the stove.
Logic: k1

behavior k1():
    body:
        bind rice: item where:
            is_food_rice(rice)
        bind stove: item where:
            is_stove(stove)

        symbol pot_with_water=exists pot:item: is_pot(pot) and has_water(pot)
        if not pot_with_water:
            bind pot: item where:
                is_pot(pot)
            achieve has_water(pot)
            achieve inside(rice, pot)
            achieve on(pot, stove)
            achieve is_on(stove)

        else:
            bind pot: item where:
                is_pot(pot) and has_water(pot)
            achieve inside(rice, pot)
            achieve on(pot, stove)
            achieve is_on(stove)

g6.goal: Make a cup of lemon water with additional sugar.
g6.full_content:
Task name: Drink
Goal: Make a cup of lemon water with additional sugar.
Guidance: Clean a lemon and cut it into pieces. To cut lemon, you can put the lemon on a cutting board, use knife to slice it. Then find a cup and fill it with water. Then put the lemon pieces in the cup. Put sugar to the cup.
Logic: k1

behavior k1():
    body:
        bind lemon: item where:
            is_food_lemon(lemon)
        bind sugar: item where:
            is_food_sugar(sugar)
        symbol cup_with_water=exists cup:item: is_cup(cup) and has_water(cup)
        if not cup_with_water:
            bind cup: item where:
                is_cup(cup)
            achieve has_water(cup)
            achieve inside(lemon, cup)
            achieve inside(sugar, cup)
        else:
            bind cup: item where:
                is_cup(cup) and has_water(cup)
            achieve inside(lemon, cup)
            achieve inside(sugar, cup)

g4.goal: Get a cup of milk and heat it by microwave.
g4.full_content:
Task name: Drink
Goal: Get a cup of milk and heat it by microwave.
Guidance: You can put the milk inside a cup. Then put the cup inside the microwave and turn the microwave on to heat.
Logic: k1

behavior k1():
    body:
        bind milk: item where:
            is_milk(milk)
        symbol has_cup_with_milk=exists cup:item: is_cup(cup) and inside(milk,cup)
        if not has_cup_with_milk:
            bind cup: item where:
                is_cup(cup)
            achieve inside(milk, cup)
            bind microwave: item where:
                is_microwave(microwave)
            achieve inside(cup, microwave)
            achieve is_on(microwave)
        else:
            bind cup: item where:
                is_cup(cup) and inside(milk,cup)
            bind microwave: item where:
                is_microwave(microwave)
            achieve inside(cup, microwave)
            achieve is_on(microwave)

g8.goal: Make a bowl of egg salad with boiled egg, lemon, and vegetables.
g8.full_content:
Task name: Cook some food
Goal: Make a bowl of egg salad with boiled egg, lemon, and vegetables.
Guidance: Boil an egg and cut it into pieces. To boil egg, find a pot and fill it with water. Then put the pot on a stove and turn on the stove. Put the egg in the pot. After boiling, put the egg on a cutting board and cut it into pieces. Then put the egg in a bowl. Then clean a lemon and cut it into pieces. Put the lemon in the bowl. Then wash vegetables and cut them into pieces. Put the vegetables in the bowl.

Logic: k1 then k2
behavior k1():
    body:
        bind egg: item where:
            is_food_egg(egg)
        bind stove: item where:
            is_stove(stove)
        symbol pot_with_water=exists pot:item: is_pot(pot) and has_water(pot)
        if not pot_with_water:
            bind pot: item where:
                is_pot(pot)
            achieve has_water(pot)
            achieve on(pot,stove)
            achieve is_on(stove)
            achieve inside(egg, pot)
        else:
            bind pot: item where:
                is_pot(pot) and has_water(pot)
            achieve on(pot,stove)
            achieve is_on(stove)
            achieve inside(egg, pot)


behavior k2():
    body:
        bind egg: item where:
            is_food_egg(egg)
        bind lemon: item where:
            is_food_lemon(lemon)

        achieve clean(lemon)
        achieve cut(lemon)

        bind vegetables: item where:
            is_food_vegetable(vegetables)

        achieve clean(vegetables)
        achieve cut(vegetables)

        symbol egg_in_bowl=exists bowl:item: is_bowl(bowl) and inside(egg, bowl)
        if not egg_in_bowl:
            bind bowl: item where:
                is_bowl(bowl)
            achieve inside(egg, bowl)
            achieve inside(lemon, bowl)
            achieve inside(vegetables, bowl)
        else:
            bind bowl: item where:
                is_bowl(bowl) and inside(egg, bowl)
            achieve inside(lemon, bowl)
            achieve inside(vegetables, bowl)

g2.goal: Prepare a sink of soapy water in the bathroom.
g2.full_content:
Task name: Clean the bathroom
Goal: Prepare a sink of soapy water in the bathroom.
Guidance: You can prepare a sink of soapy water by putting soap in the sink, then turn on the faucet to fill the sink with water.
Logic: k1
S0_Actions: switchon_executor(faucet_43) or switchon_executor(faucet_232)

S2_Actions: switchon_executor(faucet_134) or switchon_executor(faucet_308)

        bind bathroom: item where:
            is_bathroom(bathroom)
        bind sink: item where:
            is_sink(sink) and inside(sink, bathroom)

        if not has_soap_in_sink:
            bind soap: item where:
                is_soap(soap)
            achieve inside(soap, sink)

g3.goal: Wash the bowls and plates with dishwasher. And wash forks by hand.
g3.full_content:
Task name: Wash dishes with dishwasher
Goal: Wash the bowls and plates with dishwasher. And wash forks by hand.
Guidance: Put all the bowls and plates into the dishwasher. Turn on the dishwasher. Wash the forks by hand.

S1_Actions: wash_executor(fork_2150), wash_executor(fork_2151)
S2_Actions: wash_executor(fork_2103), wash_executor(fork_2104)


behavior k1():
    body:
        bind dishwasher: item where:
            is_dishwasher(dishwasher)
        foreach o: item:
            if is_bowl(o) or is_plate(o) and dirty(o):
                achieve inside(o, dishwasher)
        achieve is_on(dishwasher)

g6.goal: Iron the shirt and the skirt, and place them on the bed.
g6.full_content:
Task name: Iron clothes
Goal: Iron the shirt and the skirt, and place them on the bed.
Guidance: For each piece of clothing, place it on the ironing board. Turn on the iron, then put it the iron the clothing, push and pull the iron. Finally, place the clothing on the bed.

Logic: (k1 then k3 then k2 then k4) or (k2 then k4 then k1 then k3)

S0_Actions: push(iron_2089),pull(iron_2089)
S1_Actions: push(iron_2161),pull(iron_2161)
S2_Actions: push(iron_2117),pull(iron_2117)

behavior k1():
    body:
        bind shirt: item where:
            is_clothes_shirt(shirt)
        bind iron: item where:
            is_iron(iron)
        bind ironing_board: item where:
            is_ironing_board(ironing_board)
        achieve on(shirt, ironing_board)
        achieve on(iron, shirt)
        achieve is_on(iron)

behavior k2():
    body:
        bind skirt: item where:
            is_clothes_skirt(skirt)
        bind iron: item where:
            is_iron(iron)
        bind ironing_board: item where:
            is_ironing_board(ironing_board)
        achieve on(skirt, ironing_board)
        achieve on(iron, skirt)
        achieve is_on(iron)  

behavior k3():
    body:
        bind shirt: item where:
            is_clothes_shirt(shirt)
        bind bed: item where:
            is_bed(bed)
        achieve on(shirt, bed)

behavior k4():
    body:
        bind skirt: item where:
            is_clothes_skirt(skirt)
        bind bed: item where:
            is_bed(bed)
        achieve on(skirt, bed)

g3.goal: Prepare a bowl of water and put the bowl on the table in home office. Then find my cat put it on the table.
g3.full_content:
Task name: Pet cat
Goal: Prepare a bowl of water and put the bowl on the table in home office. Then find my cat put it on the table.
Guidance: To get water, you can hold a bowl and get close to a faucet. Then turn on the faucet to fill the bowl with water. Then put the bowl on the table in the home office. After that, find my cat and put it on the table in the home office.
Logic: k1 then k2

behavior k1():
    body:
        bind home_office: item where:
            is_home_office(home_office)
        bind table: item where:
            is_table(table) and inside(table, home_office)
        symbol has_bowl=exists bowl:item: is_bowl(bowl) and has_water(bowl) and on(bowl, table)
        if not has_bowl:
            bind bowl: item where:
                is_bowl(bowl)
            achieve has_water(bowl)
            achieve on(bowl, table)
        
        
behavior k2():
    body:
        bind cat: item where:
            is_cat(cat)
        bind home_office: item where:
            is_home_office(home_office)
        bind table: item where:
            is_table(table) and inside(table, home_office)
        achieve on(cat, table)

g2.goal: Wash the fish at first. Then put milk, turkey, eggs, fish and chicken on one of the table in dining room.
g2.full_content:
Task name: Put groceries in Fridge
Goal: Wash the fish at first. Then put milk, turkey, eggs, fish and chicken on one of the table in dining room.
Guidance: Wash the fish at first. To wash the fish, put the fish in a sink and wash it. Then put milk, turkey, eggs, fish and chicken on one of the table in dining room.

Logic: k1 then k2
S0_Actions: wash_executor(food_fish_2021)
S1_Actions: wash_executor(food_fish_2093)
S2_Actions: wash_executor(food_fish_2054)


behavior k1():
    body:
        bind dining_room: item where:
            is_dining_room(dining_room)
        bind sink: item where:
            is_sink(sink) and inside(sink, dining_room)
        bind fish: item where:
            is_food_fish(fish)
        achieve inside(fish, sink)

behavior k2():
    body:
        bind milk: item where:
            is_milk(milk)
        bind turkey: item where:
            is_food_turkey(turkey)
        bind eggs: item where:
            is_food_egg(eggs)
        bind fish: item where:
            is_food_fish(fish)
        bind chicken: item where:
            is_food_chicken(chicken)
        bind dining_room: item where:
            is_dining_room(dining_room)

        symbol table_with_groceries=exists table:item: (is_table(table) and on(milk, table) and inside(table, dining_room))
        if not table_with_groceries:
            bind table: item where:
                is_table(table)
            achieve on(milk, table)
            achieve on(turkey, table)
            achieve on(eggs, table)
            achieve on(fish, table)
            achieve on(chicken, table)
        else:
            bind table: item where:
                is_table(table) and (on(milk, table) and inside(table, dining_room))
            achieve on(milk, table)
            achieve on(turkey, table)
            achieve on(eggs, table)
            achieve on(fish, table)
            achieve on(chicken, table)

            is_milk(milk)
        bind eggs: item where:
            is_food_egg(eggs)
        bind dining_room: item where:
            is_dining_room(dining_room)

        if not table_with_groceries:

                is_table(table)
            achieve on(milk, table)
            achieve on(eggs, table)
        else:
            bind table: item where:
                is_table(table) and (inside(table, dining_room) and on(milk, table))
            achieve on(milk, table)
            achieve on(eggs, table)

behavior k2():
    body:
        bind fridge: item where:
            is_fridge(fridge)
        bind trashcan: item where:
            is_trashcan(trashcan)
        foreach o: item:
            if inside(o, fridge):
                achieve inside(o, trashcan)

behavior k3():
    body:
        bind milk: item where:
            is_milk(milk)
        bind eggs: item where:
            is_food_egg(eggs)
        bind fridge: item where:
            is_fridge(fridge)
        achieve inside(milk, fridge)
        achieve inside(eggs, fridge)

g4.goal: Find the book and put it on the coffe table in home office. Then prepare a cup of hot milk, put it on the table.
g4.full_content:
Task name: Prepare a reading space
Goal: Find the book and put it on the coffe table in home office. Then prepare a cup of hot milk, put it on the table.
Guidance: Find the book on the bookshelf and put it on the coffe table in the home office. To prepare a cup of hot milk, find the milk in the fridge, put it in a cup, put the cup in the microwave. Turn on the microwave. Finally put the cup on the table in the home office.
Logic: k1 then k2 then k3

behavior k1():
    body:
        bind home_office: item where:
            is_home_office(home_office)
        bind table: item where:
            is_table(table) and inside(table, home_office)
        symbol has_book=exists book:item: is_book(book) and on(book, table)
        if not has_book:
            bind book: item where:
                is_book(book)
            achieve on(book, table)

behavior k2():
    body:
        bind milk: item where:
            is_milk(milk)
        symbol cup_with_milk=exists cup: item:is_cup(cup) and inside(milk,cup)
        if not cup_with_milk:
            bind cup: item where:
                is_cup(cup)
            achieve inside(milk, cup)
            bind microwave: item where:
                is_microwave(microwave)
            achieve inside(cup, microwave)
            achieve is_on(microwave)
        else:
            bind cup: item where:
                is_cup(cup) and inside(milk,cup)
            bind microwave: item where:
                is_microwave(microwave)
            achieve inside(cup, microwave)
            achieve is_on(microwave)

behavior k3():
    body:
        bind milk: item where:
            is_milk(milk)
        bind home_office: item where:
            is_home_office(home_office)
        bind table: item where:
            is_table(table) and inside(table, home_office)
        symbol cup_with_milk=exists cup: item:is_cup(cup) and inside(milk,cup)
        if not cup_with_milk:
            bind cup: item where:
                is_cup(cup)
            achieve inside(milk, cup)
            achieve on(cup, table)            
        else:
            bind cup: item where:
                is_cup(cup) and inside(milk,cup)
            achieve on(cup, table)
